column2:
sf_2020_1 %>% 
  full_join(sf_2020_2) %>% 
  full_join(sf_2020_3) %>% 
  full_join(sf_2020_4) %>% 
  mutate(harvest_year = 2020) %>% 
  rename(desc = Region) %>% 
    filter(desc %in% c("3. Sclerotia, %", "No. of samples")) %>% 
  distinct() %>%
 pivot_longer(cols = c(2:21),
               names_to = "region",
               values_to = "per_sclerotia")
